name: MusicValleyRadio
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: music valley radio
des:
Welcome to the Valley!
THE HOME OF QUALITY ALBUM ROCK
Veteran broadcasters Ron Gentry and son, Brian, bring a refreshing return to "old school" album-oriented rock from the Music City. From stadium rockers to intimate singer-songwriters, you'll hear everything from classic to current.

The NEW Music Valley Radio is a uniquely curated format that blends the golden-era of classic rock and folk rock with alternative/ indie...(oh, did we mention folk rock?!) Yes, from B-Sides to deep cuts, The Valley focuses on the full repertoire of albums not unlike vintage AOR FM stations of yesteryear, yet with a timeless Nashville mix all its own. Broadcasting from the Sweet City USA studio in the Music Valley Village- Nashville, TN
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
